The Science & Story Behind It

The development of ‘Giant Prawn Jr.’ represents a breakthrough in crustacean growth regulation and proportional scaling.

  • The precise half-scale morphology is achieved through selective breeding for specific allometric growth regulators that maintain perfect proportions while limiting overall size through early maturation triggers.
  • The maintained flavor intensity despite reduced size results from selecting for individuals with concentrated nutrient partitioning into muscle tissue rather than skeletal growth.
  • The reduced aggression and improved stocking density are correlated traits of the dwarfing gene complex, making ‘Giant Prawn Jr.’ significantly more manageable in high-density culture than its full-sized ancestor.

In short, Macrobrachium “Giant Prawn Jr.” is a proportion-perfect, flavor-identical, and space-optimized cultivar, a genetic marvel that packages all the culinary excellence of the legendary Giant River Prawn into a compact, urban-friendly format without compromising on quality or taste.
